dw:transform-message.doc:name: Transform Message
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/json --- payload map ((payload01 , indexOfPayload01) -> { id: payload01.accountID, firstName: (payload01.name splitBy ' ')[0], lastName: (payload01.name splitBy ' ')[1], address: payload01.street ++ " " ++ payload01.city ++ ", " ++ payload01.state, postal: payload01.postal, country: payload01.country, creationDate: (payload01.creationDate as :string) ++ "+0:00", accountType: payload01.accountType, miles: payload01.miles })

dw:transform-message.doc:name: Transform Message
dw:transform-message.dw:set-payload: %dw 1.0 %output application/json --- (payload map ((payload01 , indexOfPayload01) -> { id: payload01.accountID, firstName: (payload01.name splitBy ' ')[0], lastName: (payload01.name splitBy ' ')[1 to -1] joinBy " ", address: payload01.street ++ ", " ++ payload01.city ++ ", " ++ payload01.state, postal: payload01.postal, country: payload01.country, creationDate: (payload01.creationDate as :string) ++ "+0:00", accountType: payload01.accountType, miles: payload01.miles }))[0]
